title: HomeEscape Announces New Features
text:
The travel industries fastest growing rental site adds new functionality
MIAMI, FL (08/03/2015) HomeEscape™ , announces new site-wide features now available to users.
“We are excited to announce new features available to users on HomeEscape™, such as a new and improved calendar function, along with a total site redesign in the coming weeks,” commented Avi Vaknin, CEO of HomeEscape™.
Additionally, the growing travel site continues to expand its usability, offering greater representation of countries and their respective currencies.
“We are growing at breakneck speed,” Vaknin remarked. “I anticipate a very busy year ahead – and a very satisfying year for users looking for a free travel experience .”
Our goal with this new website is to create the most complete, user-friendly website that connects homeowners and property managers to travelers looking for their perfect escape. Here is your opportunity to get in on the ground floor of the brand new advertising channel for the multi-billion dollar real estate sharing market.
About HomeEscape: HomeEscape connects homeowners and property managers with travelers who seek the space, value and amenities of vacation rental homes as an alternative to hotels. With detailed property descriptions, photos and list of amenities and nearby attractions, HomeEscape makes it easy to find and compare properties all over the world.
